properties.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Lake Tahoe Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 7:45AM PST until January 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...Adjusting snow potentials. Updating wording.

* WHAT...Periods of light snow expected this morning. Snow
accumulations from a dusting to 2 inches for Truckee and Lake
Tahoe areas, with 2-4 inches at passes including Donner and Mt
Rose.

* WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area.

* WHEN...through 10 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute. Plan for delays
and chain controls over I-80 and Highway 50 along with other
roads around Lake Tahoe.
properties.instruction:
Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during
periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to
reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since
it takes longer to stop on slick roadways.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING
